name: 陳雅玫
objective: This course aims to introduce various translation practices in the digital age and to familiarize students with appropriate translation methods and strategies. The topics covered in this course include translation and technology, online collaborative translation, advertising/marketing translation, tourism translation and localization. Translation exercises and authentic translation projects will be arranged throughout the course to enable students to apply their theoretical knowledge to actual translation tasks.
schedule:
Week 1 introduction/discourse analysis and translation 
Week 2 Global Voices Lingua Project (1)
Week 3 Global Voices Lingua Project (2)
Week 4 Global Voices Lingua Project (3)
Week 5 TED Open Translation Project
Week 6 Facebook Translation Project 
Week 7 fansubbing 
Week 8 translation of tourist texts (1) 
Week 9 translation of tourist texts (2)/ translation of advertisements (1)
Week 10 translation of advertisements (2)
Week 11 group translation tasks
Week 12 technology and translation (1)
Week 13 technology and translation (2)
Week 14 video game translation (1)
Week 15 video game translation (2)
Week 16 group presentations (1)
Week 17 group presentations (2)
Week 18 final exam
scorePolicy:
1. continuous assessment (including attendance, participation and translation homework): 25%
2. Global Voices Lingua Project: 25%
3. group translation tasks and group presentations: 30%
4. final-exam: 20%
